title: Emerald and Diamond Grandeur: Regal Bridal Haaram
features: Elaborate floral design encrusted with dazzling brilliant-cut diamonds. Features a central oval-cut Emerald surrounded by intricate filigree work. The necklace is adorned with smaller Emerald accents along the neckline. Hanging diamond ball pendant adds movement and brilliance. Handcrafted by skilled artisans using traditional setting techniques. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting sheen and enhances the gold's natural luster.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship showcasing the artistry of Hyderabad's finest jewelers. Features ethically sourced Zambian Emeralds and high-quality diamonds. The design seamlessly blends traditional aesthetics with contemporary elegance. Makes a statement piece that is both timeless and luxurious. A symbol of prosperity and good fortune, perfect for auspicious occasions. Durable and crafted to be a treasured heirloom.
